item.title: Confluent Kafka: DeprecationWarning: AvroProducer has been deprecated. Use AvroSerializer instead.
item.description: I’ve been creating a demo showing how to ingest Avro-encoded data from Apache Kafka into Apache Pinot and ran into a deprecation warning. In this blog post, I’ll show how to update code using the Confluent Kafka Python client to get rid of that warning.
